## DatatableColumnType type

This type represents the `type` of any `DatatableColumn` in a `Datatable`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DatatableColumnType = 'string' | 'number' | 'boolean' | 'date' | 'null';
```
